channel.title: Looking for Client sided coder -- Rune Factor 317 --
channel.description:
[url=http://www.bannersketch.com/][img]http://c667194.r94.cf3.rackcdn.com/1344833770.png[/img][/url]
Hello,
I am currently hosting my server Rune Factor and only have a cheezy downloadable client, Im not very good with client sided coding and am looking for someone with experiance in the feild to help me get a webclient and better looking client.
Here's my post about the server
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556938.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556938.0.html[/url]
If you're interested in joining my team in developing my server to greater lengths please message me here or via skype/Windows Live
Skype: Jessexiv Wlm: Jessel3393@msn.com
Thanks -JesseX

item.title: Looking for Client sided coder -- Rune Factor 317 --
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You are not allowed to request programmers. IF you’d like, you can post a Development thread, or join an existing one.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for Client sided coder -- Rune Factor 317 --
